title.narrative: Sierra Leone COVID-19 Emergency Preparedness and Response Project

description.narrative: To prevent, detect and respond to the threat posed by COVID-19 and strengthen national systems for public health preparedness in Sierra Leone.

condition.narrative: As per ESCP, the Labor Management Plan (LMP) of the parent project shall be updated as part of ESMF within 30 days of projecteffectiveness and shall be implemented throughout project implementation.

As per ESCP, the expansion of the Grievance Mechanism related to COVID-19 vaccination, training of grievance focal points andpublicization shall be completed as soon as possible and made operational before the Effectiveness Date and maintained throughoutProject.
As specified in the ESCP, a medical care waste management plan shall be updated 30 days after project effectiveness and implementedthroughout project implementation.

Schedule 2. Section I. D. 1(a): By no later than one (1) month after the Effective Date, the Recipient shall prepare and furnish tothe Association, the first work plan and budget for Project (Annual Work Plan). Thereafter, not later than November 30 of eachFiscal Year during the implementation of the Project, prepare and furnish to the Association subsequent Annual Work Plans. SaidAnnual Work Plan(s) containing all activities proposed to be included in the Project during the following Fiscal Year, and aproposed financing plan for expenditures required for such activities, setting forth the proposed sources of financing.

The Recipient shall, not later than one (1) month after the Effective Date prepare and furnish to the Association, the first workplan and budget for Project (Annual Work Plan). Thereafter, not later than November 30 of each Fiscal Year during theimplementation of the Project, prepare and furnish to the Association subsequent Annual Work Plans.
The Recipient shall, not later than forty-five (45) days after the Effective Date, prepare and adopt the Project ImplementationManual.
